resources.string: There is no message to send

"The privacy policy of the mobile application Send SMS on time.

"
"1.

"
"This document describes the privacy policy of the mobile application Send SMS on time. " "The developer of the application treats the protection of privacy on the Internet Users " "using the mobile application Send SMS on time via Google Play Store as a priority and " "makes every effort to protect this privacy.

"
"2.

"
"The application Send SMS on time is installed on mobile devices, in particular on mobile " "phones and tablets after downloading it from Google Play Store.

"
"3.

"
"Using the application requires a mobile device with Android - version min. 6.0 with an " "active SIM card installed.

"
"4.

"
"Using the application doesn’t require providing any user personal data. The application " "doesn’t store any personal data that could enable a third party to identify a specific " "user of the application.

"
"5.

"
"The application Send SMS on time needs access the following permissions on a mobile " "device:
" "• sending an SMS
" "• reading an SMS
" "• contact lists
" "Application permissions can be revoked by changing the system settings on the device or " "uninstalling the application.

"
"6.

"
"If you don’t agree to this privacy policy, please don’t install the application or " "uninstall it. Permanently deleting the application from the mobile device is tantamount " "to terminating use of the application.

"
"7.

"
"This privacy policy is only complementary to the Google Play Store privacy policy. The " "developer of the application isn’t responsible for the Google Play Store privacy policy " "and compliance with the provisions of the Act on the protection of personal data and the " "Act on the provision of electronic services as part of the Google Play Store.

"
